remarks: A coefficient of a product of polynomials.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)
statement:
coefv0.1 $e |- A = ( coeff ` F ) $.
coeadd.2 $e |- B = ( coeff ` G ) $.
coemul $p |- ( ( F e. ( Poly ` S ) /\ G e. ( Poly ` S ) /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( ( coeff ` ( F oF x. G ) ) ` N ) = sum_ k e. ( 0 ... N ) ( ( A ` k ) x. ( B ` ( N - k ) ) ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d B k $.
$d F k $.
$d G k $.
$d N k $.
$d S k $.
